title: Generate a research abstract
prompt: Generate a concise, well-structured, and academically written abstract for a research paper on {topic}. Limit the length to 150–250 words. Ensure clarity, coherence, and a formal tone suitable for peer-reviewed publication.
example_topic: The Impact of Artificial Intelligence on Healthcare

title: Summarize a scientific article
prompt: Summarize the main objectives, methodology, key findings, and conclusions of the following scientific article: {input}. Use a formal academic tone, avoid personal opinions, and limit the summary to 200–300 words.

title: Create a research introduction
prompt: Write a comprehensive introduction section for a research paper on {topic}. Include the background, problem statement, research gap, and objectives. Maintain a clear, formal, and engaging academic style.
example_topic: Climate Change Adaptation Strategies in Urban Areas

title: Generate research questions
prompt: Formulate 3–5 precise, clear, and researchable questions based on the topic: {topic}. Ensure they align with academic research standards and address significant gaps in the literature.
example_topic: Blockchain Applications in Supply Chain Management

title: Design a methodology section
prompt: Write a detailed methodology section for a study on {topic}. Clearly describe the research design, participants or data sources, instruments or tools, data collection procedures, and analysis methods. Maintain a formal and structured academic tone.
example_topic: Social Media Influence on Political Awareness

title: Paraphrase academic paragraph
prompt: Rephrase the following academic paragraph while preserving its technical accuracy and meaning: {input}. Ensure clarity, conciseness, and adherence to formal academic style.
example_input: Artificial intelligence has transformed various industries, including healthcare, finance, and education, by enabling faster data analysis and improved decision-making processes.

title: Generate literature review prompts
prompt: Create a well-defined prompt for summarizing literature on the topic: {topic}. Include relevant keywords, a defined timeline, theoretical framework, and key academic themes.
example_topic: Renewable Energy Adoption in Developing Countries

title: Generate a research conclusion
prompt: Write a concise and well-structured conclusion section for a research paper on {topic}. Summarize the main findings, discuss their implications, highlight limitations, and suggest future research directions.
example_topic: Effects of Remote Work on Employee Productivity

title: Proofread and enhance research text
prompt: Carefully proofread and improve the following academic text for grammar, spelling, clarity, and formal tone: {input}. Ensure the text meets the standards of scholarly writing.
example_input: The research aims to investigates the impact of online learning platforms on student engagement, with focus on long-term retention.

title: Translate abstract to academic English
prompt: Translate the following research abstract into clear, precise, and high-quality academic English: {input}. Ensure correct grammar, formal tone, and adherence to academic writing conventions.
example_input: L'intelligenza artificiale viene sempre più utilizzata nella diagnostica medica, migliorando la precisione e riducendo i tempi di analisi.
